trans-unit.source: Provides event data that is used as a parameter object in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging"></xref> events of the root <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 매개 변수 개체로 사용 되는 이벤트 데이터를 제공는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged"> </xref> 및 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging"> </xref> 루트의 이벤트 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: This class is exposed as the `e` parameter in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> events.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스는으로 노출 된 `e` 에서 매개 변수는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> event is raised just before a new view is displayed, as a result of the end-user clicking and dragging in a chart area.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>클릭 하 고 차트 영역에 끌어 최종 사용자의 결과로 새 보기를 표시 하기 바로 전에 이벤트가 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> event is raised just after the new view is created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>새 보기를 만든 후에 이벤트가 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: It is important to note that the position and size of a view cannot be set in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> event because in this case the view is already created.
trans-unit.target: 보기의 크기와 위치를 설정할 수 없습니다에 유의 해야는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>이벤트가 경우에 뷰가 이미 만들어졌기 때문에.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: The ViewEventArgs class contains the following properties: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.ChartArea%2A> property, which is used to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object in which the view is being displayed.
trans-unit.target: ViewEventArgs 클래스에는 다음과 같은 속성이 포함 되어:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>속성을 얻는 데 사용 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>뷰가 표시 되는 개체입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name%2A> property gets the name of the chart area.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name%2A>속성 차트 영역의 이름을 가져옵니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: Other chart area properties can also be set.
trans-unit.target: 다른 차트 영역 속성을 설정할 수도 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.Axis%2A> property, which is used to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> object with which the view is associated.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.Axis%2A>속성을 얻는 데 사용 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis>보기와 관련 된 개체입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.Axis%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the type of axis, which can be X, Y, X2 or Y2, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Y, X2, Y2, 사용 하 여 축 X 일 수 있는 형식을 결정 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Other axis properties can also be set.
trans-unit.target: 다른 축 속성을 설정할 수도 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewPosition%2A> property, which represents the new position of a view.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewPosition%2A>속성 보기의 새 위치를 나타냅니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> property, which represents the new size of a view.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>속성 보기의 새 크기를 나타내는입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSizeType%2A> property, which represents the unit of measurement for the size of a view.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSizeType%2A>속성 보기의 크기에 대 한 측정 단위를 나타냅니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSizeType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified axis and newPosition parameters.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 지정된 된 axis 및 newPosition 매개 변수.

trans-unit.source: The axis of the scale view.
trans-unit.target: 눈금 뷰의 축입니다.

trans-unit.source: The start position of the new scale view.
trans-unit.target: 새 스케일 보기의 시작 위치입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified axis, newPosition, newSize and newSizeType parameters.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 지정된 된 axis , newPosition , newSize 및 newSizeType 매개 변수.

trans-unit.source: The axis of the scale view.
trans-unit.target: 눈금 뷰의 축입니다.

trans-unit.source: The start position of the new scale view.
trans-unit.target: 새 스케일 보기의 시작 위치입니다.

trans-unit.source: The new scale view size.
trans-unit.target: 새 스케일 보기 크기입니다.

trans-unit.source: The unit of measurement for the size of the new scale view.
trans-unit.target: 새 스케일 보기의 크기에 대 한 측정 단위입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> object that a view belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"> </xref> 뷰 속해 있는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: This property is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> events of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성에서 노출 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>루트의 이벤트 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>개체입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to: - Determine the type of axis—X, X2, Y or Y2—that the event is being raised for, using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성에 사용할 수 있습니다:-축 유형을 확인-X, X2, Y2 또는 Y-이벤트 발생을 사용 하 여 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Get and set axis properties, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: -축 속성 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A> 같은 가져오기 및 설정

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> object that represents the axis that a view belongs to.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"> </xref> 축에 속하는 뷰를 나타내는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object that a view belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> 뷰 속해 있는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: This property is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> events of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성에서 노출 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>루트의 이벤트 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>개체입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.ChartArea%2A> property can be used to determine the chart area that the view belongs to, by accessing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>속한 보기에 액세스 하 여 차트 영역을 확인 하려면 속성을 사용할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property can also be used to get and set chart area properties.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 가져오고 차트 영역 속성을 설정 사용할 수도 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object that represents the chart area a view belongs to.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> 뷰가 속하는 차트 영역을 나타내는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the new position of a view along an axis.
trans-unit.target: 축 보기의 새 위치를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: This property is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> events of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object, and represents the new position of a view.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성에서 노출 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>루트의 이벤트 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>개체를 보기의 새 위치를 나타냅니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: The NewPosition property can be set to a new value in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> event, but cannot be set to a new value for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> event because in this case the view is already created.
trans-unit.target: NewPosition 속성에 새 값으로 설정할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>이벤트에 대 한 새 값으로 설정할 수 없습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>이벤트가 경우에 뷰가 이미 만들어졌기 때문에.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>

trans-unit.source: The NewPosition is always measured as an axis value.
trans-unit.target: NewPosition은 항상 축 값으로 측정 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the position of a view along an axis, which is either the bottom of a vertical view or the left position of a horizontal view.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> 은 세로 보기의 아래쪽 또는 왼쪽된 위치를 가로 뷰의 축 따라 뷰의 위치를 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of a view along an axis.
trans-unit.target: 축 보기의 크기를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the size of a view along an axis.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> 축 따라 뷰의 크기를 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The size is either the height of the vertical view or the width of the horizontal view.
trans-unit.target: 크기에는 세로 뷰 높이 또는 가로 보기의 너비입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the unit of measurement for the new size of a view.
trans-unit.target: 보기의 새 크기에 대 한 측정 단위를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>, the unit of measurement for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> property is automatically determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control, and will be either a number or a day.
trans-unit.target: 로이 속성이 설정 된 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>, 측정 단위는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>속성에 의해 자동으로 결정 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>컨트롤을 숫자 또는 하루 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>

trans-unit.source: Recall that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> property is always measured as an axis value.
trans-unit.target: 이전에 설명한 대로 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>속성은 항상 축 값으로 측정 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Make sure that if you explicitly set the size type, the type matches the axis that the scrollbar belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 크기 형식을 명시적으로 설정 하는 경우 형식이 일치 축 스크롤 막대에 속하는 있는지 확인 합니다.

trans-unit.source: In other words, do not specify <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType> if the axis does not use <xref:System.DateTime> values.
trans-unit.target: 즉, 지정 하지 않으면 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>축을 사용 하지 않는 경우 <xref:System.DateTime>값.</xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> property can be set to a new value in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> event, but cannot be set to a new value for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> event because the view is already created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>속성에 새 값으로 설정할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>이벤트에 대 한 새 값으로 설정할 수 없습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>이벤트 보기 이미 만들어졌기 때문에.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"></xref> enumeration value that represents the unit of measurement for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize*> property, which represents the width or height of a data view.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"> </xref> 측정 단위를 나타내는 열거형 값의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize*>너비 또는 데이터 보기의 높이 나타내는 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize*>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"> </xref>합니다.
